title: Bertolucci shoots 1900
creator_credit: Gianni Amelio, Luca Olmastroni and Daria Cinematografica
brief_description: A documentary made during the shooting of Bertolucci’s “Novocento” which includes comments by Bertolucci on his attitudes to film-making as well as reflecting the particular style of this film-maker. Highlights the role of the director, his relationship with the crew and points to various film-making techniques by showing the shooting of specific scenes. Suitable for Upper Secondary-Tertiary level students.
